forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 58 overnight. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the air feels crisp and alive, carrying hints of the shimmering ocean nearby. Currently, a gentle breeze from the west-southwest stirs the awakening city, bringing whispers of the cool marine layer that often cloaks the Golden Gate. The overnight chill lingers—though patches of clarity begin to emerge, it is still draped partially in a veil of low clouds, hinting at the characteristically moody nature of this coastal locale. 

As the sun rises higher, the forecast promises a blue sky adorned with only the most modest of clouds, creating a pleasing backdrop for the day ahead. Expect temperatures to rise pleasantly, leading to a comfortable afternoon with the day’s high around 67. Residents and visitors alike may wish to shed the layers they donned early this morning in favor of light, breathable attire as the daytime warmth invites outdoor pursuits. Perhaps a leisurely walk to the waterfront or a stop at a local café, where the aroma of freshly baked goods mingles with the salty sea air, would suit the mood perfectly. As the winds gust softly, bringing movement to the trees, it’s an ideal day to embrace the San Francisco spirit—one that balances the serene with the dynamic, as the city awakens to greet the sun.
